TEXT.TITLE: KING WORLD <KWP> SAYS SHOW EXTENDED
TEXT.BODY: King World Productions Inc said its syndicated television series "The Oprah Winfrey Show" has been extended through the 1989-90 broadcast season. It said six of the top 10 markets have renewed the series through the end of the decade. Reuter
